-- "getBoardDetail" : 게시글 상세 조회 SELECT id, title, "content", view_cnt, rdate, user_id, use_yn FROM board.board1 b WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND id = #{boardId}
-- "insertBoard1" : 게시글 작성 INSERT INTO board.board1 (title, content, view_cnt, rdate, user_id, use_yn) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, 0, NOW(), 'admin', 'Y') returning id
mapper.update: -- "updateboard1" : 게시글 수정 UPDATE board.board1 SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}::Integer
-- "plusViewCnt" : 조회수 1 증가 UPDATE board.board1 SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE id = #{id}::Integer
mapper.delete: -- "deleteBoard1" : 게시글 삭제 DELETE FROM board.board1 WHERE id = #{id}
